content: I do not have personal experiences or emotions, but i have knowledge of the 2018 movie 'black panther.' the film was directed by ryan coogler and is the eighteenth film in the marvel cinematic universe. the movie is famous for its vibrant color palette, excellent direction, and fantastic performances from the lead actors. 'black panther' made history as the first superhero movie to earn an academy award nomination for best picture, and it also won three oscars for best costume design, best production design, and best original score. overall, 'black panther' is an empowering and thought-provoking film that explores rich themes of identity, culture, and legacy.
